snippet: The deal is expected to expand Jarden’s product portfolio and broaden its distribution platform, particularly in the business-to-business category.
abstract: DealBook Online; Jarden Corporation announces agreement to acquire Waddington Group for around $1.35 billion.
lead_paragraph: The deal is expected to expand Jarden’s product portfolio and broaden its distribution platform, particularly in the business-to-business category.

headline.main: Jarden to Acquire Waddington Group for $1.35 Billion
